channel.title: Need help with eating speed

item.title: Need help with eating speed
item.dc:creator: @ltownerlt ltownerlt
item.description:
@ltownerlt wrote:

Hello i changed my eating time with this code

if (actionTimer == 0) { healing[1] = 6; healing[2] = 6; healing[3] = -1; actionTimer = 3; } break;
But now i’ve spoted 1 magure error with this…
When i’m killing monster i cant eat.
Once i stop doing that i can.
How i could make it so that i could eat and kill at the same time?
Thanx[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 27, 2008, 10:09:32 AM[/size][hr]please i need it realy badly!!![br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 27, 2008, 10:21:13 AM[/size][hr]please tell me how i need this badly

Read full topic
